ComicInfo.Title: A Stray Nympho-Maniac; Ray Finch Proudly Presents the Beautiful Star of the Ray Finch Review...
ComicInfo.Summary: The first page is a full-page illustration; the second page is a Eadweard Muybridge-style flip book-ready breakdown of Hotsy Totsy's "fanny dance."
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:18:05. [Issue ID 277670]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Justin Green,Jay Lynch,Michael McMillian,Robert Crumb,Spain Rodriguez,Justin Green,Jay Lynch
ComicInfo.Inker: Justin Green,Jay Lynch,Michael McMillian,Robert Crumb,Spain Rodriguez,Justin Green,Jay Lynch
